## About Me
My name is **Samruddhi Naik**. I graduated from Lexington High School in Massachusetts and I'll be a freshman in college this coming fall. I like sports, cooking, music, robotics and computer science. 

## About the Project
*Median Wages by Gender and Occupation* visually shows how women are being paid less than their male counterpart. 

### Goals
* Show the gap on wages by gender
